abstracts.cdata!:
The loan would be used by DBP to make
            sub-loans to finance the acquisition of new and used ships
            and conversion and repairs of existing ships of the
            inter-island fleet. It would also provide technical
            assistance to the Maritime Industry Authority (MIA) and DBP
            if bilateral aid is not forthcoming.
